name: yourchestra
description: Conduct an orchestra using your body & a browser
author: Rupert Parry

scripts.build-start: mv src/config.js src/config.build.js && mv src/config.prod.js src/config.js
scripts.build-finish: mv dist/static/index.html dist/ && cp src/app.yaml dist/ && mv src/config.js src/config.prod.js && mv src/config.build.js src/config.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && yarn run build-start && yarn run build-parcel && yarn run build-finish
